div.p: Detailed information about the type of the image - its kind, purpose, or the kind of equipment used to generate it.

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/dicom-cid29

Include codes from
http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 363679005 (Imaging)

Include all codes defined in
http://hl7.org/fhir/media-subtype

description.value: Detailed information about the type of the image - its kind, purpose, or the kind of equipment used to generate it.
